meanings.definition: A vehicle designed for passenger transportation.
meanings.sent1: My dad's automobile is blue and shiny.
meanings.sent2: We took the automobile to the beach for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The automobile seemed to have a mind of its own, choosing the scenic route.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a bright red automobile on a dark night.
meanings.sent5: The automobile hummed softly as it glided down the highway.

meanings.definition: To travel in or operate an automobile.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to automobile when I turned sixteen.
meanings.sent2: We will automobile to the mountains for our vacation.
meanings.sent3: He tried to automobile with his eyes closed, but quickly realized it was a bad idea.
meanings.sent4: She could automobile through life with ease, navigating any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The idea of being able to automobile anywhere at any time excited him.
